org.opencyc.uml.interpreter
Class DoActivity

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--org.opencyc.uml.interpreter.DoActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class DoActivity
extends java.lang.Thread

Provides do-activity behavior for a state in the UML State_Machines package.
